Tisha

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

Tisha Leevi
  • Appearance: Tisha may seem a bit out of place behind a bar with her vivid, 21 year old appearance, innocent green eyes and still soft facial features. Her bright red hair that flows down until it reaches the bottom of her shoulderblades, reveal a fiery temperament. She has a slender and rather feminine build though her shoulders, legs and arms reveal the distinct muscular undertone of someone who has had her share of physical exercise. She is usually dressed in well-fitting clothes, that reveal plenty of skin in the right places without coming over as vulgar. Tisha doesn't seem to like to wear skirts or dresses however, as she is always seen wearing pants or shorts when the weather allows for it.
  • Character: Young miss Leevi has a rather attractive personality as she is almost always in a good mood and has a positive attitude towards life. Whenever she isn't busy waitressing or hosting meetings, she usually socializes with her customers and fellow townspeople. Tisha wouldn't appear to be experienced enough to keep a busy Tavern running, as she's always in the mood for partying and having fun but a part of her personality that not many get to see includes an excellent business mind.
  • Past: Not much is known about this young woman's past. Two years ago she suddenly appeared in the city of Vaalnor without any family or friends. Any Vaalorian can easily see that Tisha is definitely not from around here, even though her accent has mellowed over the years it can still be traced back to the borders near the lands of Oro, by those who have heard it before. Because of Tisha's optimistic nature and her far from bad looks she was quick in gaining the trust from the local population. Newly arrived miss Leevi could quickly score a job as a waitress with the old barkeeper. Only half a year after Tisha arrived in Vaalnor, her patron parted to the next world and left her his establishment. The man had been a widower for years and he never had any children. With Tisha Leevi being in charge she immediately gave the worn Tavern a new name, The Four Leaves, and appearance. Ever since business has been picking up.
Category: Key Figures
